CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("http://localhost:47280/SalesforceAPI.aspx?UserAccount="& $User.Username &"&Destination="&OtherPhone&"&ContactId="&Id,"Click here to call this contact with 3CX (OtherPhone)")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Clicking this link will launch a call to this contact's other phone and connect it to your phone
CustomField.label: Call other phone via 3CX
